entry.title: $2400 // 2 Bedroom in Park Slope South ($2400)
entry.content:
This sunny 2 bedroom apartment is great for roommates. It features hardwood floors through out, a spacious living room, Eat-In Kitchen and lots of closet space. Includes heat & hot water. One block to R subway line (Prospect Avenue Station) and 3 stops to Atlantic/Barclay's station (2, 3, 4, 5, N, Q, D)
Neighborhood includes 24 hour laundromat, Whole Foods, Ikea and tons of local bars & restaurants.
•1st bedroom 12 ' x 12 '
•2nd bedroom 12 ' x 12 '
•Living Room 16' x 12 '

Requirements: 1 month security, 1 month's rent, last 4 paystubs, employment verification, $50 credit check

*** Sorry, No Pets. ****

Call 646-530-0780 for viewing appointment.
